address.description: address is the member's account address.

weight.description: weight is the member's voting weight that should be greater than 0.

metadata.description: metadata is any arbitrary metadata attached to the member.

added_at.description: added_at is a timestamp specifying when a member was added.

Member.title: Member
Member.description: Member represents a group member with an account address, non-zero weight, metadata and added_at timestamp.
